guilds.description: Bot guilds manage aur list karein

restart.prompt: Kya aap nishchit roop se **{client}** ko restart karna chahte hain?

status.error: Bot restart karte samay ek error aaya.

shutdown.prompt: Kya aap nishchit roop se shutdown karna chahte hain?

deploy.description: Discord API ke sath slash commands sync karein
deploy.prompt: Aap commands ko kahan un/deploy karna chahte hain?

status.deployed_global: Commands global roop se deploy kiye gaye.
status.deployed_guild: Commands is guild mein deploy kiye gaye.
status.removed_global: Commands global roop se hataye gaye.
status.removed_guild: Commands is guild se hataye gaye.
status.failed: Command ke madhyam se deployment vifal raha: {command}

create.description: Ek specific guild ke liye invite link banayein.

errors.guild_not_found: Guild nahin mila. Sunishchit karein ki ID sahi hai.
errors.no_suitable_channel: Us guild mein invite banane ke liye paryapt permissions wala koi upyukt channel nahin mila.

create.success: **{guildName}** ke liye invite link: [Yahan click karein]({url})

destroy.description: Ek guild mein bot dwara banaye gaye sabhi invite links nasht karein

errors.guild_not_found: Guild nahin mila. Kripya ek valid ID pradan karein.
errors.generic: Invites nasht karne mein vifal. Jaanch karein ki kya mere paas us guild mein 'Manage Server' permissions hain.

destroy.success: **{guildName}** mein mere dwara banaye gaye **{count}** invite(s) safaltapoorvak nasht kiye gaye.
destroy.not_found: Is guild mein mere dwara banaya gaya koi invite nahin mila.
